I could not believe how flattering this dress was! I love the length too! I got compliments all night long. I’d definitely recommend but would caution that there is no give in the material at all. I ordered my usual size, and it fit perfectly. Really satisfied, especially considering the affordable price!
Bought this for a 50’s day at work and just recently wore it to a wedding! Flattering and really comfortable. I love it!
Material is not good quality and very itchy and rough.  Returned it.
Was so excited to get this dress, but so sad once it arrived. Really small in the bust and super short in the skirt! Poor quality material. So sad but it needed to be returned!!

I got this dress for homecoming and I was super excited! But when I tried it on it was too big even though I got the smallest size and it was really itchy on the shoulders. The material was so cheap and felt awful on the shoulders. I will be returning it.
It's fits fine,but the material isn't  the best,the embroidery  isn't  sewn very well,threads are dangling.will somehow try to fix.
I wore for a tea party and this dress was the talk of the night. The fit was true to size. No pockets. Above average quality. Felt good, not restricting.
